Class BaseViewController<E extends JNavigationFrame>

  • java.lang.Object

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The view associated
    public abstract class BaseViewController<E extends JNavigationFrame>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class to create a ViewController associated to a view BaseViewController.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseViewController

        public BaseViewController​(@NotNull
                          E frame)
        Attach the frame E to this controller. A frame must be unique, so it can't be reused between navigation controllers.
        Parameters:
        frame - The frame

    • Method Detail

        public E getFrame()
        Returns:
        The frame associated with this controller.

      • getNavigationController

        Returns:
        The NavigationController associated with this controller.

      • isAttachedToNavigationController

        public boolean isAttachedToNavigationController()
        Returns:
        true if this view controller is attached to a NavigationController. True not means the controller is visible.
